hero.title: Empowering Your Birth Journey

hero.description: Supporting families through pregnancy, birth, and postpartum with compassionate, evidence-based care in English and Spanish.

about.title: About Vio La Doula
about.subtitle: Your Doula Latina
about.intro: I'm Vio — a Latina doula, HypnoBirthing® educator, and motherhood coach. I support women and families through pregnancy, birth, and postpartum with calm, confidence, and connection. My approach brings together the power of the body, mind, and heart so you can experience motherhood rooted in your truth and supported every step of the way.
